text: Zvino kana mwedzi inoera (1st, 7th, 11th uye mwedzi wechi 12) yapfuura, zvino chiurayai maMushrikoon (avo vasingatendi muhumwe hwaAllah) kupi zvako kwamunovawana, uye vatapei uye movakomberedza, uye movarindirira panzira dzose. Asi kana vakakumbira ruregerero uye voita Swalaah, uye vopa zvipo (Zakaah), zvino chisiyai nzira yavo yakafaranuka. Chokwadi, Allah vanoregerera zvikuru, uye vane tsitsi zhinji
